    • Method Detail

      • assignmentThroughSearch

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,IGAssignmentsSearch.RootResult> assignmentThroughSearch(IGObject aItem,
                                                                                   ToplevelPath path,
                                                                                   boolean aSearchUpward,
                                                                                   boolean aSearchDownward,
                                                                                   boolean aWritersOnly,
                                                                                   boolean aReadersOnly)
        The search results in Assignments rather than Reads and Writes. Found Assignments trigger further searches, one per assignment. Assignment keeps a ref to the initiated search so that we can navigate to both assignment location in the code and further searches it produced. If assigned signal was already searched for further assignments, result is just reused. This results in a graph.
